issue.title: www.animeshqip.org

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.animeshqip.org/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.animeshqip.org%2F) ### Comment > website is unusable > when adguard is not there i can use website but with ads ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/otq8pi3bxa8wkocccsgkgoog8c4o4wcft07xfu8f28.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v5.1.139 MV2 System version: | `Windows 10` Browser: | Firefox Tracking protection: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=ext&product_version=5.1.139&system_version=Windows+10&manifest_version=2&browser=firefox&filters=2.3&userscripts_enabled=false&browsing_security_enabled=true&browsing_security_statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=false&is_third_party_cookies=false&is_first_party_cookies=false&is_referrer=false&is_user_agent=false)
